Okawa Shaznay bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood si Cameroon na onye mbụ si mba ya iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma banye Nollywood na ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri blockbuster Iyore; na-eme n'akụkụ Rita Dominic na Joseph Benjamin. Okawa Shaznay enwetakwala ihe a ma ama site na ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke afọ 2016 Delilah: The Mysterious Case of Delilah Ambrose O meriri onyinye Exquisite Lady of the Year (ELOY) maka TV Actress of the year n'afọ 2016 maka ọrụ ya na Delilah
A mụrụ Okawa Shaznay na Cameroon
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Presbyterian Secondary School Mankon, Bamenda, Cameroon
Shaznay mechara kwaga United States, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na ndekọ ego na Mahadum Texas Southern
O mekwara ihe nkiri n'afọ 2016 wepụtara "REFUGEES" nke e mere na Ghana n'afọ 2012 ma wuchaa na Atlanta USA n'ime ọnwa ndị ikpeazụ nke afọ 2013.
